_meanings:
({#Bavati, baBUva#},
{#aBUt, Bavizyati, BavituM, BUta#})

{@--3@} To spring or proceed from, arise;
{#kroDAdBavati saMmohaH#} <ls>Bg. 2. 63</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">14. 17.</ls>

{@--8@} To stay, abide; remain,
<ls>U. 3. 37.</ls>

{@--9@} To serve, do; {#idaM#} 
{#pAdodakaM Bavizyati#} <ls>Ś. 1.</ls>

{@--10@} To be 
possible (usually with a future tense
in this sense); {#Bavati BavAn#} 
{#yAjayizyati#} <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--15@} To
conduct oneself, behave.

{@--1@} To cause to be or become, call
into existence, call into being.

{@--2@} 

To cause, produce, effect.

{@--3@} To
manifest, display, exhibit.

{@--5@} To think or reflect, consider,
fancy, imagine.

{@--7@} To prove,
substantiate, establish; <ls>Y. 2. 11.</ls>
{@--8@} To purify.
{@--9@} To get, obtain.

{@--10@}
To mingle or mix.

{@--11@} To change
or transform into.

{@--12@} To soak,
steep.

{@--13@} To devote or addict 
oneself to.
{@--14@} To convince.

{@--15@} To 
perfume, scent.

To
wish to be or become &c.
To get, obtain.
To obtain, gain.

{@--1@} To think, 
reflect.
{@--2@} To mix, mingle.

{@--3@} To be
purified (connected with caus. of
{#BU#} <ab>q. v.</ab> above).
